description.value:
Special: Blast (5)

Note: Highly Illegal and Heretical. Contains fresh Mind-Mould Spores. If released, its outbreak can last months and kill thousands. Those exposed make +10 Toughness Test (or -10 test if Psyker), if failed infected devleop painful rash, after 2d10 hours growths emerge from their skin, must make Toughness Test each hour with -10 cumulative penalty, if passing three tests fight off fungus and recover (Medicae Skill Tests can assist), if test is failed suffer 10 nonpermenant Toughness and 5 Intelligence Damage and roll for Hallucinogen effect. If Toughness Test reaches 0, head explodes and scatter spores over 5 metres, repeating cycle. Infected Psykers must push all powers by at least 2, and if they are killed by the mould also generate a psychic eruption that causes all psykers within 1d10 * WP Bonus to make +10 Willpower Test to avoid infection.
